author: Simon Kent, Simon Kent
title: U.S. Diplomat: China Endangering the World with Coronavirus
description: China endangered the world by spreading "malign misinformation" about the deadly coronavirus outbreak and allowing it to spread outside the Communist state's borders, the U.S. ambassador to London said Thursday.
content:
China endangered the world by spreading “malign misinformation” about the deadly coronavirus outbreak and allowing it to spread outside the Communist state’s borders, the U.S. ambassador to London said Thursday.
